name: Fifth Period
description:
Our first game in UE4!

Made as part of the 2018 Epic Megajam, with the theme "Reality is often inaccurate".

Why is the class so empty? And why do you have to chase cats?
We're not sure either....

Controls:
WASD - move
mouse - look around
shift - run
space - jump
e - interact/catch/elevator
